channel.title: Play on Bitwalker
channel.description: Recent content in Play on Bitwalker

item.title: Proxied Streaming Uploads with Scala/Play
item.description: I recently was working on a project using a mashup of technologies: Scala, Play Framework, Sqrrl/Accumulo, Microsoft SQL Server, Hadoop/HDFS, Hive, and some others. Needless to say, rampup was a bit like swallowing water from a firehose. I was brought on to help get a release completed by it’s deadline, so I wasn’t on the project for more than a month, but I did encounter one very fun problem that I felt like sharing.
